message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.SI, cs.CY, cs.CR 

This paper deals with online deception detection using social network analysis to collect a large dataset of deceptive and truthful online reviews from Amazon. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CL (Computation and Language) which deals with natural language processing and computational linguistics. The paper also involves information retrieval (cs.IR) as it discusses the effectiveness of general features for deception detection. Additionally, the paper involves social network analysis (cs.SI) for data collection. Cybersecurity (cs.CY) is also a possible category as the paper deals with detecting deception in online reviews. Finally, the paper involves cryptography and security (cs.CR) as it discusses the importance of data privacy and anonymity in the data collection process.
